analysis.description: FIRE.isContract (/unique_chucks/9/0x8469a695d70033ecd170c82be1253842162aa77e.sol#522-531) is declared view but contains assembly code

FIRE.claimTokens (/unique_chucks/9/0x8469a695d70033ecd170c82be1253842162aa77e.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(address(msg.sender),balance) (/unique_chucks/9/0x8469a695d70033ecd170c82be1253842162aa77e.sol)

Reentrancy in FIRE.approve (/unique_chucks/9/0x8469a695d70033ecd170c82be1253842162aa77e.sol#462-474):
	External calls:
	- ! TokenController(controller).onApprove(msg.sender,_spender,_amount) (/unique_chucks/9/0x8469a695d70033ecd170c82be1253842162aa77e.sol#468-471)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- _approvals (/unique_chucks/9/0x8469a695d70033ecd170c82be1253842162aa77e.sol#474)
